title: Number of Ways to Build Sturdy Brick Wall

content.content: this problem should be hard? not sure if I\'m the only one who has the feeling...
Feels like Hard or definitely the higher end of Medium. Not straightforward to come up with how to construct the DP table.
Definitely above medium
There are many HARD problems easier than this one!\nSpent an entire day trying to get it accepted. And when it did, my solution was among the bottom 20%. :(
AnyOne please let me know the problem statement ,it\'s confusing ,height = 2, width = 3, bricks = [1,2] , why bricks[0] = > width 1 and height =1 is not considered ?
